dict.acceptation: 可疑的；猜疑的，怀疑的；多疑的，不信任的；多心；

sent.orig: They could become uncharacteristically suspicious of family members -- or trusting of telemarketers.
sent.trans: 他们可以无共性的怀疑家庭成员，或者轻信电话销售员。

sent.orig: Methods Epidemiological survey and analysis on spot, collect the sample from suspicious patient and laboratory examination.
sent.trans: 方法现场流行病学调查分析，病人标本采集，实验室检查。

sent.orig: Chemist that he is, Charles is suspicious of all doctors' prescription．.
sent.trans: 查尔斯是位化学家，所以他对任何大夫开的药都怀疑。

sent.orig: Fegelein's attempt at desertion made Hitler immediately suspicious of Himmler.
sent.trans: 菲格莱因的企图逃跑马上引起了希特勒对希姆莱的怀疑。

sent.orig: They speak their minds when upset and have suspicious natures.
sent.trans: 他们畅所欲言当有可疑的不满和性质。
